CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function unique_name_545 is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is because it takes an attribute 'title' from an element and directly uses it to generate HTML content. If an attacker can control the 'title' attribute, they can inject malicious scripts that will be executed when the generated HTML is rendered by a web browser.
